changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE abos_sofs_sp.file_metadata ( file_id bigint NOT NULL, deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, delivery_mode varchar(3) NOT NULL, time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, date_created timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_indexed_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES abos_sofs_sp.indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_file_id_uc UNIQUE (file_id) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_sp.file_metadata OWNER TO abos_sofs_sp;

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE abos_sofs_sp.timeseries ( deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, mean_latitude double precision, mean_longitude double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), time_deployment_start timestamp with time zone, time_deployment_end timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT timeseries_pk PRIMARY KEY (deployment_number) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_sp.timeseries OWNER TO abos_sofs_sp;

"TIME_quality_control" character(1), "LATITUDE" real, "LATITUDE_quality_control" character(1), "LONGITUDE" real, "LONGITUDE_quality_control" character(1), "TEMP" real, "TEMP_quality_control" "ATMP" real, "ATMP_quality_control" character(1), "ATMP_2" real, "ATMP_2_quality_control" character(1), "RELH" real, "RELH_quality_control" character(1), "RELH_2" real, "RELH_2_quality_control" character(1), "RAIN_AMOUNT" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_quality_control" character(1), "RAIN_AMOUNT_2" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_2_quality_control" character(1), "SW" real, "SW_quality_control" character(1), "SW_2" real, "SW_2_quality_control" character(1), "LW" real, "LW_quality_control" character(1), "LW_2" real, "LW_2_quality_control" character(1), "PL_CMP" real, "PL_CMP_quality_control" character(1), "PL_CMP2" real, "PL_CMP2_quality_control" character(1), "UWND" real, "UWND_quality_control" character(1), "UWND_2" real, "UWND_2_quality_control" character(1), "VWND" real, "VWND_quality_control" character(1), "VWND_2" real, "VWND_2_quality_control" character(1), "WDIR" real, "WDIR_quality_control" character(1), "WDIR_2" real, "WDIR_2_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD" real, "WSPD_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_2" real, "WSPD_2_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_3" real, "WSPD_3_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_4" real, "WSPD_4_quality_control" character(1), CONSTRAINT measurement_rt_pk PRIMARY KEY (file_id , index ), CONSTRAINT measurement_rt_file_metadata_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES abos_sofs_sp.file_metadata (file_id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_sp.measurement_rt OWNER TO abos_sofs_sp; COMMENT ON COLUMN abos_sofs_sp.measurement_rt.index IS 'index of measurement in netCDF file';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceprop_rt_map AS SELECT DISTINCT timeseries.* FROM timeseries JOIN file_metadata USING (deployment_number) WHERE delivery_mode = 'RT';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceprop_rt_data AS SELECT measurement_rt.*, timeseries.geom FROM measurement_rt JOIN timeseries USING (deployment_number) ORDER BY file_id, index;
